[ ]  Compare code with .moduletester file (test added or deleted) @model
[ ]  Manage Test.is_valid() @model
[ ]  Force save .moduletester file @model
[ ]  Atomic write of files (backup/swap) and directories @model

[ ]  Are args and timeout editable directly in the test manager window @HMI
